faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about our platform

items.question: How quickly can I get started?
items.answer: You can get started in minutes! Simply sign up, complete your company profile, and you're ready to start managing your logistics operations. Our onboarding process is designed to be quick and intuitive.

items.question: Is my data secure?
items.answer: Absolutely. We use enterprise-grade encryption, regular security audits, and comply with international data protection standards. Your data is stored in secure, redundant data centers with 99.9% uptime guarantee.

items.question: Can I integrate with my existing systems?
items.answer: Yes! Our platform offers comprehensive API access and pre-built integrations with popular ERP systems, payment gateways, and other logistics tools. Our team can also help with custom integrations.

items.question: What kind of support do you provide?
items.answer: We offer 24/7 customer support via email, chat, and phone. Professional and Enterprise plans include priority support with dedicated account managers. We also provide comprehensive documentation and video tutorials.

items.question: Can I customize the platform for my business?
items.answer: Yes, our platform is highly customizable. You can configure workflows, create custom reports, set up automated notifications, and even white-label the platform for Enterprise customers.

items.question: What happens if I need to scale up?
items.answer: Scaling is easy! You can upgrade your plan at any time. All your data and configurations are preserved when you upgrade. Enterprise customers can also request custom scaling solutions.
